fields.putative_activities: UDP-GlcA: N-acetylglucosaminyl-proteoglycan β-1,4-glucuronosyltransferase (EC 2.4.1.225); UDP-Xyl: xylan β-1,4-xylosyltransferase (EC 2.4.2.-); α-1,3-L-arabinofuranosyltransferase (EC 2.4.2.-); arabinan α-1,5-L-arabinofuranosyltransferase (EC 2.4.2.-); glucomannan β-1,2-galactosyltransferase (EC 2.4.1.-); pectin β-1,4-glucuronyltransferase (EC 2.4.1.-); xylogalacturonan β-1,3-xylosyltransferase (EC 2.4.2.41); xyloglucan β-1,2-galactosyltransferase (EC 2.4.1.-).
